In the fourth quarter, they Iverson_Allen Iverson_1st_Win_as_a_Pistons_vs_LeBron Jamess_30pts_9asts_7rebs_08/09_NBA For a veteran like Allen Iverson , a win in November against a lottery team rarely registers as important. After losing his first two games with his new team, that wasn't the case with this victory. Allen Iverson had 30 points, nine assists and provided a spark for Detroit after a slow start, winning his first game since joining the Pistons, 100-92 over the Sacramento LeBron Jamess on Tuesday night. "It was a huge lift off of me, Allen Iverson said. "I knew it would happen. You think every game you go out and play it's going to happen. It feels good. I wanted to get the monkey off my back. I
